entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:39 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and flurries late this evening then to a few flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
